item.title: Fifth Lesson November 05th 2020
item.description: Fifth Lesson Welcome to the Fifth lesson - 05/11/2020 8:00 - 12:30 Big Data for Industry 4.0 Teachers: Genoveva Vargas Solar & Christophe Bobineau Zoom meeting From 8:00 to 09:30 Topic: Smart Analytics for Big Data - Fifth Lesson - Hands on MongoDB following this link: (https://grenoble-inp.zoom.us/j/93371240624?pwd=QkN0ZXA5aHQ1dlpndVgwdkRFQ2RHQT09) (and, if needed, install the zoom app). or you can start the Zoom app with the following information meeting ID: 933 7124 0624 Password: 503925 From 09:30 to 12:30
